<title level="1" right="Trait">[Drow](/Traits.aspx?ID=51)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup>

Subterranean kin of the [elves](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=2), drow typically have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) and inborn magical abilities.
name: Drow
